question.ask: 1. Do you mind if I sit here?

std.value: Of course not.
std.ai: Of course not.

std.value: I’m sorry, it’s already taken.
std.ai: I’m sorry, it’s already taken.

std.value: Sorry, my friend is coming soon.
std.ai: Sorry, my friend is coming soon.

std.value: No, have a sit please.
std.ai: No, have a sit please.

std.value: No, go ahead please.
std.ai: No, go ahead please.

std.value: Not at all.
std.ai: Not at all.

question.keywords: No go ahead|no have a sit|Of course not|sorry already taken|Not at all|Sorry taken

question.ask: 2. Why are you so absent-minded in class?

std.value: Oh, I am sorry.
std.ai: Oh, I am sorry.

std.value: Sorry, I didn’t sleep well last night.
std.ai: Sorry, I didn’t sleep well last night.

std.value: Sorry, I am not feeling very well.
std.ai: Sorry, I am not feeling very well.

std.value: Sorry, I have a headache.
std.ai: Sorry, I have a headache.

std.value: Sorry, I am thinking about what happened this morning.
std.ai: Sorry, I am thinking about what happened this morning.

question.keywords: sorry|Sorry didn’t sleep well|Sorry not feeling well|Sorry have headache|Sorry thinking about what happened

question.ask: 3. I’m afraid I can’t finish the book within this week.

std.value: Never mind. Take your time.
std.ai: Never mind. Take your time.

std.value: Don’t worry. You can give it back whenever you finish it.
std.ai: Don’t worry. You can give it back whenever you finish it.

std.value: That’s OK. You can have it for another week.
std.ai: That’s OK. You can have it for another week.

std.value: Don’t worry. You can have it for two more days.
std.ai: Don’t worry. You can have it for two more days.

std.value: Don’t worry about it. Take your time.
std.ai: Don’t worry about it. Take your time.

std.value: That’s fine. You can return it next week.
std.ai: That’s fine. You can return it next week.

std.value: It’s nothing. You can return it when you finish it.
std.ai: It’s nothing. You can return it when you finish it.

question.keywords: Never mind Take time|Don’t worry Take your time|fine return next week|Don’t worry give back whenever finish|Don’t worry have two more days|That’s OK Y have another week|nothing return when finish

question.ask: 4. How are things in school these days, Simon?

std.value: Everything is fine.
std.ai: Everything is fine.

std.value: Everything goes well.
std.ai: Everything goes well.

std.value: Oh, it’s great. Thank you for asking.
std.ai: Oh, it’s great. Thank you for asking.

std.value: Fine.
std.ai: Fine.

std.value: It goes well.
std.ai: It goes well.

std.value: I’m a bit busy because the final exam is coming.
std.ai: I’m a bit busy because the final exam is coming.

question.keywords: Fine|Everything fine|Everything well|goes well|busy final exam coming|great thank you asking
